name: Food Dehydrator Machine Detachable, 8 Stainless Steel Trays, 600W Dryer for Jerky, Herb, Meat, Veggies, Fruit, Dog Treats, LED Display, 48H Timer & 86℉-167℉ Temperature Control, Recipe Book Included
about_this_item: 8-Tier Stainless Steel Trays: KEENSTAR Food dehydrator with build to last 304 stainless steel drying trays. Compared to plastic drying trays that are heavily contaminated with the food oils and juice, KEENSTAR corrugated mesh drying trays has a smaller contact area with the food, making it easier to clean. The machine body is made of food-grade high-quality plastic, all materials are BPA-free. Enjoy healthy, delicious & low-calorie snacks with the KEENSTAR Food Dehydrator Machine.

Even Heat Horizontal Food Dryer: Hot air of the Vertical Food Dryer comes out from the bottom, the upper layer receives less heat and the food dries slowly, KEENSTAR Horizontal Food Dryer makes each tier food even heat , no need to manually adjust the position of the drying tray. The KEENSTAR Food Dehydrator has 600 Watts of drying power to ensure you can dry more food, faster and easier.

Digital Temperature & Time Control: An enclosed thermostat from 86ºF to 167ºF in 9ºF increments. At the same time, the time can be set from 0.5-48 hours in 30-minute increments. It allows you to achieve the best results when drying different foods. We have prepared 6 optional drying function modes. You can adjust the time and temperature according to actual needs.

Easy to Clean & Safty: Each stainless steel tray is dishwasher safe or washed with warm soapy water. When the timer ends, the dehydrators for jerky will automatically shut off. If the machine overheats, the overheat protection will turn on. The transparent outer casing helps you track your food's progress without opening the whole machine up.

Large capacity but Not Bulky: KEENSTAR food dehydrator can be assembled and disassembled by yourself. You can prepare different types of dried fruits or jerky simultaneously in 7.2ft²drying space. If the food dehydrator is not used for a long time, it can be disassembled and stored in a small size. KEENSTAR food dehydrator comes with assembly tools, a mesh screen, a fruit roll-up sheet, a user manual, and a recipe.

Customer Service: KEENSTAR provides 24-hour friendly customer service. If you have any issues related to KEENSTAR food dehydrator, please feel free to contact us. You can dry fruits, vegetables, grains, meats, herbs, and flowers, and also can be used to make snacks for your pets.

title: Get's Really Hot So Keep It Ventilated
content: This is my first dehydrator, and I gotta say I enjoy it. It was pretty easy to assemble as the instructions depict how quite well. The included tool is also much better than I'm use to (allen key with a handgrip). It came with all the metal holding trays, but after doing research it looks like you'll want to use silicone or food grade plastic to make things easier to clean. That said, it came with one food grade cooking tray so you'll probably want to invest in more since you have 10 shelves.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2024

title: I Don’t Like the Stainless Steel Trays at All
content: I sliced up two bananas and was able to fit them all on one tray for my first attempt. It has a preset which made it nice and easy, however, as I would periodically come by to check on it... I noticed it was very hot to the touch. The back/top was so hot you can't touch it. I was worried as I thought I was smelling something electrical burning, but I believe this was the banana. Anywho, all went well and they turned out great!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2024

title: easy to set up, complex to use
content: Cleanup was super easy when using the food grade plastic tray that came with it and I've purchased a couple more since two bananans cooked down to a handful of chips. As far as I can tell though, this is a good dehydrator as long as you leave it ventilated.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2024

title: I’ve been wanting one for so long, and I’m definitely not disappointed.
content: This dehydrator is such a great size compared to my old one which was huge (the size of a small refrigerator).  I like that I can do small batches of herbs, fruits, or vegetables.  The fan seems to circulate the air evenly and the temperature and time control work well.  It is decently quiet.  However, the stainless steel trays are not to my liking.  They are a twisted and woven wire grid and not easy to clean.  I’ve already replaced them with silicone mesh.  Other than the trays, I like the dehydrator.  Four stars.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2024

title: Excellent dehydrator
content: PS.  The dehydrator needs to be assembled.  It takes about 15 minutes and is not at all hard.  The manufacturer includes a special tool to assemble.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2024

title: Works Well, Fit and Finish Just Ok
content: I have an orange tree with way too many oranges for me alone.  So first thing I tried with this was picking a dozen oranges and washing and slicing them thin, then I steamed the slices for about 3 minutes.  I filled the six trays and started the machine at 9 pm at 160 degrees F and turned it down to 135 degrees and left them over night for 18 hours until afternoon.  It is easy to look at the contents thru the clear top and sides, and it is not a bad idea to check for texture a couple of times.  I allowed them to cool completely and then put the slices into vacuum jars for storage.  I used about 11 kwh of electricity, so at US average of 23 cents per kwh, it works out to about $2.50 for the drying.  You need to consider whether freezing or drying would be more economical for you.  It can be expensive if you use the machine during peak hours, and it might not be competitive with freezing in some locales.  I like the texture and the flavor of the dried orange slices, but it is a fair amount of work and I cannot see myself doing it as a regular method of food storage.  For the rating, I'm judging based on the fact that it works as advertised.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2024

title: Affordable and works well
content: I'm obsessed with this food dehydrator! It has 8 trays, adjustable temperature control, and a digital timer, making it so easy to dry jerky. I haven’t got to try anything else yet, but I’m sure it will work great.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2024

title: Works perfectly!

title: Works well, but you have to assemble it

title: Love it!

title: Great, portable dehydrator
content: This dehydrator has an impressive 8-tier stainless steel tray system, allowing for a variety of things to be dried simultaneously, which is a significant advantage for those looking to prepare large batches of goods. Its digital temperature and time control caters to different drying needs well. The 360° hot air circulation makes sure the heat distributes evenly. The body is made of a high quality plastic, though some might prefer their dehydrator to be made of full metal construction. Additionally, the large capacity is a plus, but it may require considerable counter space, which could be a downside for users with limited kitchen space. Overall, this dehydrator worked great for my needs!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2024

title: Easy to assemble, easy to use
content: Easy to clean up and works great. We started a farm and are working to he more self sufficient. This helps me make a variety if snacks and preserve foods. It's compact but holds a lot.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024

title: Easy to Assemble, Easy to Use
content: I used to have a dehydrator that was used a few times but it was such a pain to put together and then clean afterwards that it fell into disuse and finally given away.  This one is so much easier to assemble, use and then cleanup.  This takes up very little space on my countertop.  It operates very quietly.  The controls are easy to understand and to use.  Finally, it holds a lot.  I love dried fruit but it is so expensive for a little bag at the grocery store - and look at the list of ingredients!  Here I can make as much as I want with only the ingredients I want for just the cost of some apples, oranges, etc.  Recommended
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2024

title: Much easier to use than my old round one
content: This was such a breeze to put together, and what a difference design makes! I had an old round dehydrator with stackable trays that was just a pain to use. These slide out trays make all the difference. My dogs now have healthy chicken jerky for treats.  It is nice knowing that the treats I feed them have been prepared by me, and I know everything that went into making them - chicken, just chicken, and nothing but chicken! The cost of making them at home versus buying in the store means that this dehydrator will pay for itself in nearly four months (we have two dogs, and they have friends). I plan to have dogs longer than four months, so this is a smart investment. The trays are easy to clean and use.  The directions and recipes for drying various items are great - I may try drying some other items once I'm caught up on chicken jerky for the dogs. I highly recommend this easy-to-use dehydrator.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2024

title: So cool.
content: I've always wanted to try food dehydrating, but never had the means or the know-how.  This device gives me both.  It comes with a really useful guide for use and setup instructions to assemble the machine.

title: The dehydrator is a must-have it is EXCELLENT !!!!

With gardening season here this is the perfect way to save and store all those extra vegetables that you might not have a chance to eat right now. Dehydrate them and you can store them safely!! This is absolutely a must have and a great price!!! We've made our own trail mix a multitude of times and it's very easy to clean.

title: Smaller profile

post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2024

title: Easy to clean dehydrator with nice display
content: I love the ability to see what is going on from any side, making it easy and fun to see what is going on inside.  It was easy to assemble even though it did not have the parts numbered and they said.  Not really a good test but on the first load I packed apples, bananas, orange, lemon and two limes.  The apples came out very nice and a little chewy and the citrus (orange, lime, lemon) were crisp.  The bananas never really made it but I know it was me and not the unit.  I cut them about a quarter or less and they came out chewy instead of crisp but taste was excellent so I’m happy but my daughter wants them crisp. I used the silicon for the bananas but they did stick a bit so I don’t recommend that and will use parchment next time and be more careful slicing them thin or use a mandolin.  Overall I like the machine and any problem was user error. I’m totally pleased with the unit along with my daughter who is anxious to use it also.  At under a hundred dollar price point it's well worth it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2024

title: Able to feed an army and still collapse down to tiny package

I find that taking out the metal trays and the drip tray and then cleaning up the dehydrator by wiping it down does the job great. This dehydrator shows the temperature on the LED display rather than relying on a circle dial and I much prefer the precision.
